block.p: There is a primary election today in New Jersey for the State Senate and the General Assembly. Polls are open from 6 a.m. to 8 p.m. Voter assistance is available toll free at 1-877-NJVOTER (1-877-658-6837). There is a special election on the East Side of Manhattan in the 65th Assembly District. Polls are open from 6 a.m. to 9 p.m. Voters can call the New York City Board of Elections toll free at 1-866-VOTENYC (1-866-868-3692).
